Name: Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice
Title: Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice
Desc: The frost flower blooms as a heart undivided.

Talent.Name: Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice
Talent.Desc: During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.\n(You must have at least 2{SPRITE_PRESET#2101} <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
